translations: v．使不再抱幻想，使清醒：让某人意识到现实，使失去对某事物的幻想或期望。
· The harsh reality of life disenchants many young people.
生活的严酷现实让许多年轻人不再抱幻想。

sentences.sentence: It is new characters of the postmodern information technology that information technology disenchants and enchants the world.
sentences.translation: 信息技术对世界祛魅与返魅是后现代信息技术哲学的新特性。
